declarations.name: KamiMedia

cssProperties.description: Object fit of the media (only for video and image).
cssProperties.name: --kami-media-object-fit

slots.description: Displayed when media is not supported.
slots.name: unknown

members.name: extension
members.description: *(readonly)* Get extension of the media.

members.name: type
members.description: *(readonly)* Get the type mime of the media.

members.name: isVideo
members.description: *(readonly)* Return true if media is a video.

members.name: isImage
members.description: *(readonly)* Return true if media is an image.

members.name: isAudio
members.description: *(readonly)* Return true if media is an audio.

members.name: isPDF
members.description: *(readonly)* Return true if media is a pdf.

members.name: isUnknow
members.description: *(readonly)* Return true if media is not supported.

members.name: src
members.description: Source of the media.

members.name: alt
members.description: Defines an alternative text description of the image.

members.name: controls
members.description: Allow the user to control video or audio playback.

members.name: autoplay
members.description: Video or audio are automatically begins to play.

members.name: loop
members.description: Automatically replay the video or audio at the end of it.

members.name: muted
members.description: Mute the video or audio.

members.name: volume
members.description: Define the volume of the video or audio.

members.name: height
members.description: Height of the media.

members.name: width
members.description: Width of the media.

members.name: crossorigin
members.description: Indicates whether to use CORS to fetch the related media.

members.name: loading
members.description: Indicates how the browser should load the image.

members.name: fullscreen
members.description:
Display the current media in fullscreen.
It use the `requestFullscreen()` element method.
This can only be call by a gesture from the user.

declarations.name: KamiPdf

members.name: src
members.description: Source of the pdf.

members.name: scale
members.description: Scale of the pdf.

members.name: load
members.description:
Load the pdf depending on the `src` attribute.
By default this method is called when the component is mounted.

members.name: clear
members.description:
Clear the current pdf.
It will remove all pages display.

events.name: loading-success
events.description: Emitted when data is loaded successfuly.

attributes.name: src
attributes.description: Source of the pdf.

attributes.name: scale
attributes.description: Scale of the pdf.

declarations.summary: A simple viewer that allows users to easily read and view PDF.

cssProperties.description: RGB color of the progress-bar container.
cssProperties.name: --kami-theme-primary-rgb

members.name: value
members.description: Percentage of the progress bar completed

members.name: time
members.description: Define the time used when you call the ``go()`` method.

members.name: absolute
members.description: Set the position of progress-bar on the top of the parent element.

members.name: bottom
members.description: Working only with the absolute attr. Set the position to the bottom.

members.name: go

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: set the progress-bar to this value

members.description:
This method allow you to set the value of the progress bar using an animation.
The duration of this animation is defined by the attr ``time``.
If the time is not set the value of the progress-bar will be updated without any animation.

events.name: finish
events.description: Called when the ``go()`` method is done.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Percentage of the progress bar completed

attributes.name: time
attributes.description: Define the time used when you call the ``go()`` method.

attributes.name: absolute
attributes.description: Set the position of progress-bar on the top of the parent element.

attributes.name: bottom
attributes.description: Working only with the absolute attr. Set the position to the bottom.

declarations.name: KamiFlash

cssProperties.description: Color of the text when isn't outlined.
cssProperties.name: --kami-theme-white

cssProperties.description: RGB color of an info flash.
cssProperties.name: --kami-theme-info-rgb

cssProperties.description: RGB color of a success flash.
cssProperties.name: --kami-theme-success-rgb

cssProperties.description: RGB color of a warning flash.
cssProperties.name: --kami-theme-warning-rgb

cssProperties.description: RGB color of an error flash.
cssProperties.name: --kami-theme-error-rgb

members.name: create

parameters.name:
{
    message = '',
    type = KamiFlashType.info,
    position = KamiFlashPosition['bottom-center'],
    outlined = false,
    blured = false,
    gap = DEFAULT_GAP,
    size = DEFAULT_SIZE,
    time,
    container,
  }

members.description:
A **static** method which allow you to create a
`<kami-flash>` and to attach it to any element.
It also return the instance of the element create.

members.name: clear
members.description:
A **static** method which allow you to clear all the
current flash display on the screen.

members.name: type
members.description: Define the type of flash.

members.name: position
members.description: Define the position of the flash.

members.name: message
members.description: Set the message into the flash.

members.name: time
members.description: Define the time before the flash will be close.

members.name: outlined
members.description: Set the flash in outline mode.

members.name: blured
members.description: Set the flash in blur mode **(this can cause performance issue)**.

members.name: gap
members.description: Define the gap between stacked flash.

members.name: size
members.description: Define the size of a stacked flash.

members.name: index
members.description: Index of the flash.

members.name: setIndex
members.description: Update the index of the flash.

members.name: close
members.description: Remove the flash from the screen.

members.name: delete
members.description:
Delete completely the flash.
This will directly delete the flash without any animation.
If you when remove a flash use the `close()` method instead of.

events.name: close
events.description: Called when the flash is closing.

events.name: delete
events.description: Called when the flash is complete deleted.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Define the type of flash.

attributes.name: position
attributes.description: Define the position of the flash.

attributes.name: message
attributes.description: Set the message into the flash.

attributes.name: time
attributes.description: Define the time before the flash will be close.

attributes.name: outlined
attributes.description: Set the flash in outline mode.

attributes.name: blured
attributes.description: Set the flash in blur mode **(this can cause performance issue)**.

attributes.name: gap
attributes.description: Define the gap between stacked flash.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Define the size of a stacked flash.

declarations.summary: A simple alert component for your notifications.

members.name: registerHighlightStyle
members.description:
A **static** method which add hightlight style
to all the new instance of ``kami-markdown``.

members.name: registerHighlightLanguage
members.description:
A **static** method which add hightlight language
to all the new instance of ``kami-markdown``.

members.name: use
members.description:
A **static** method which allow you to use a markdown-it plugin
for all new instance of `kami-markdown`.

declarations.summary: Convert markdown in html using markdown-it.

events.description: When the current theme is updated.
events.name: theme

attributes.description: Define which mode should be used.
attributes.name: mode

slots.description: In slot for the in-out mode
slots.name: in

slots.description: Out slot for the in-out mode
slots.name: out

members.name: show
members.description: Show or hide the element.

members.name: appear
members.description: Run the transition directly when it's append to the document.

members.name: intersection
members.description: Run the transition only when the element is on the viewport. *(Only work with **appear** attribute)*

members.name: from
members.description: From value depending on the transition used.

members.name: to
members.description: To value depending on the transition used.

members.name: duration
members.description: Duration of the transition.

members.name: delay
members.description: Delay before the transition is run.

members.name: easing
members.description: Easing of the transition.

members.name: transition
members.description: Name of the transition used.

members.name: toggle
members.description:
This method allow you to toggle the state of this element.
Depending if it's a single or an in-out transition.
* Show/hide the element for the single mode.
* Switch elements in the ``in`` and
``out`` slots for the in-out mode.

parameters.name:
{
    child,
    el,
    keyframes,
    options,
    show = true,
  }

{
    childIn,
    childOut,
    inEl,
    outEl,
    keyframes,
    options,
  }

events.name: display
events.description: Called when the element is display

events.name: hide
events.description: Called when the element is hide

attributes.name: show
attributes.description: Show or hide the element.

attributes.name: appear
attributes.description: Run the transition directly when it's append to the document.

attributes.name: intersection
attributes.description: Run the transition only when the element is on the viewport. *(Only work with **appear** attribute)*

attributes.name: from
attributes.description: From value depending on the transition used.

attributes.name: to
attributes.description: To value depending on the transition used.

attributes.name: duration
attributes.description: Duration of the transition.

attributes.name: delay
attributes.description: Delay before the transition is run.

attributes.name: easing
attributes.description: Easing of the transition.

attributes.name: transition
attributes.description: Name of the transition used.
